title: Divine by Nature: Spiritual Messages from the Planet's Natural Elements
description: Divine by Nature is filled with inspiring stories of interactions and spiritual adventures with Nature's most sacred aspects - the non-physical entities who create the physical beauty we see all around us. Divine messages from each individual entity will allow you insight into the real consciousness of Nature and guide you to have a personal journey of your own inside the peaceful power of water, the purifying grace of air, the cleansing nature of earth and so much more.
author: Michelle L. Hankes
